page.title: 18CHILDREN IN A RURAL AREA
page.content: Those living north of the Stoop are taken by parents to Muggington Prim- ary School- 4 at present.When going on to Secondary education they attend Ecclesbourne Comprehensive School, Duffield. Children south of the Stoop area taken by parents to Brailsford Primary School - 5 at present & move on to secondary education in Ashbourne At this stage several children in the neighbourhood are sent to Boarding School. For recreation children have to rely on parents or friends taking them to various places.Cubs in Brailsford, Brownies - Turnditch.Swimm -ing,discos in Ashbourne. Many child- ren have ponies & are members of the Pony Club & spend a great deal of time at local shows in the summer. They seem to grow up to be very self-sufficient.
